mapper.update: create table PYTHON ( JOBUID CHAR(36) NOT NULL, BOOKID BIGINT NOT NULL, PRODUCTID VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, STRINGTEMPLATE LONGTEXT NOT NULL, CREATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (JOBUID), CONSTRAINT PYTHON_BOOKID_FK FOREIGN KEY (BOOKID) REFERENCES booktbl (BOOKID) )
mapper.insert: insert into PYTHON (JOBUID, BOOKID, PRODUCTID, STRINGTEMPLATE) values (#{jobUid}, #{bookId}, #{productId}, #{stringTemplate});
mapper.select: select * from PYTHON where BOOKID = #{bookId} AND PRODUCTID = #{productId} order by CREATED desc limit 1
